turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Adler Planetarium.
turn.1: What is the Adler Planetarium in Vienna?
turn.2: Adler Planetarium The Adler Planetarium is a public museum dedicated to the study of astronomy and astrophysics.
turn.4: It was founded in 1930 by Chicago business leader Max Adler.
turn.6: It is located on the northeast tip of Northerly Island at the shore of Lake Michigan in Chicago, Illinois.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: The Adler was the first planetarium in the United States and is part of Chicago's Museum Campus, which includes the John G. Shedd Aquarium and The Field Museum.
turn.10: The Adler's mission is to inspire exploration and understanding of the universe.
turn.11: Is it open to the public?
turn.12: The Adler Planetarium opened to the public on May 12, 1930.
